verbose_text: Increasing evidence has shown that the levels of AFB1-DNA adducts correlate with HCC risk and prognosis, whereas the formation process of AFB1-DNA adducts can be modified by some factors such as detoxifying enzymes and DNA repair enzymes [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], while our present studies exhibited that miR-429 expression promoted AFB1-DNA adducts formation and increased adducts mount in liver cancer tissues.
